list.columnDisplayBelowMap: Display stores details below the map
list.textDeleteConfirm: Do you want to delete store group?

detail.fieldTitleHelpTextGroupZoomFactor: If this field is empty or less than 0, the value 10 is automatically set as zoom factor.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextInternalName: The internal name will be displayed at store groups list page in Administration.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextName: The name will be displayed at Storefront.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextActive: If active, then the store group will be displayed at Storefront.
detail.fieldTitleLabelDisplay: Display group icon at store locator page
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplayBelowMap: If active, it will display list with details of the stores which are assigned to this store group.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplay: When this option is enabled, the group icon is displayed on the store search page in the storefront.
detail.fieldTitleLabelDisplayBelowMap: Show list of group (only possible if group icon is displayed)
detail.fieldTitleLabelDisplayDetail: Show link to additional detail page (only possible if the list is displayed)
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextDisplayDetail: If this option is enabled, then an additional link for the detail page is displayed in the list.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextPriority: The icon of the The stores / merchants group will be displayed in the selected location in the storefront.
detail.inputPositionLabel: Display of the group symbol (prerequisite for displaying the list)
detail.inputPositionHelpText: The group icon is displayed at the selected position.
detail.inputFieldListHelpText: Selected fields will be displayed in store details at Storefront.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextSeoUrl:
For SEO url you can enter just string/word and you can use "/" in url (not at beginning of the url).
 The entered SEO url will be generated and it will be used together with Shopware path. Example: "custom/store-group". The SEO path template can be changed in Settings>Shop>SEO.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextMetaTitle: The meta title will be displayed at store group page in Storefront.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextMetaDescription: The meta description will be displayed at store group page in Storefront.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextIconWidth: The width will be used for displaying group icon at Google map.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextIconHeight: The height will be used for displaying group icon at Google map.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextIconAnchorLeft: The left anchor will move icon at displayed position in Google map from left to the right based on entered value.
detail.fieldTitleHelpTextIconAnchorRight: The top anchor will move icon at displayed position in Google map from bottom to the top based on entered value.
detail.messageSaveError: Store group could not be saved.
